entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Grand Forks
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Fog patches developing after midnight. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 4 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 01 January 2023
